gcci.text: Qwen reports that the H100 average price of $3.25/hr reflects easing supply constraints, prompting US‑East data centers to accelerate capex upgrades.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek observes that token input costs at $1.28 per million are fueling aggressive API price wars, compelling competitors to prioritize model efficiency.

gagl.text: Kimi warns that the 120 TWh annual load is stretching the grid, amplifying the case for nuclear baseload to reduce carbon emissions.

aipi.text: GLM notes that market sentiment remains cautiously bullish, with growth sustainability offsetting moderate bubble concerns as capital continues to flow.
